entry.title: Pride Of Darjeeling - Rare First Flush Tea in Pinewood Box with Zardosi Work on Velvet Pouch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Teas India
Type: Black Tea
Price: 37.83

Description :
An outstanding and rare First Flush Tea packed in a Pinewood Box for connoisseurs of Golden Tips across the globe. Originating in Darjeeling, from the area which produces one of the finest teas in the world, this early spring selection consisting of the most tender leaves, has a delightful floral aroma with a mellowed Colour and makes for a very extraordinary and outstanding cup to relish.
Packaging:
Velvet pouch with a handcrafted peacock in golden thread, packed in an elegant pinewood box.

entry.title: Spring Magnificence Star - Darjeeling Tea First Flush 2025 - Gift Box - Tin Can in Velvet Box -
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 137.00

Packed In An Attractive Tin Can & Placed In A Tastefully Made Velvet Box
Dry Leaf:
Mostly silver tips with just a few other leaves.
Tea Colour:
Pale Yellow
Tea Infusion:
Light green leaves & bud sets with a few coppery hues and a soft & pleasant floral nose.
New 2025 very early Spring Tea from the upper division of the Namring estate in Darjeeling. The extra cautiously selected soft tender buds, plucked & processed by experienced pluckers with minimum machining, have a light, aromatic & gentle feel. The flavour profile of this very special tea is extraordinarily mellowed, mild & pleasantly sweet. The soft floral aroma further enhances the qualitative superiority of this most fascinating offering. One of the most outstanding teas of the season.

entry.title: Aroma Black & Green Tea Assortment Individual Envelope - Tea Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type:
Price: 24.99

Golden Tips Tea was established with a mission to epitomise the art of drinking gourmet teas and an endeavour to make available the luxury of pure & unblended single-origin Indian teas to connoisseurs across the globe. With a commitment to serve only the finest & freshest picks, each tea is selected with precision and packed at source within days of their harvest. Our expert team of tasters & master blenders navigate & assess each tea tasting several hundred cups every week to select those from the prime tea growing season which are destined to bear the Golden Tips stamp. A brand with passion, ethics and a heritage of over 80 years.
 
Mint Green Tea:- Fine Green tea flavoured with mint. 
 
Darjeeling Green Tea:- Fine Green Tea flavoured with citrusy lemon.
 
Jasmine Green Tea:- Fine Green Tea with a mellowed taste.
 
Darjeeling Black Tea:- Bright Colouring Darjeeling summer tea with a pleasant aroma and taste.
 
English Breakfast Tea:- Initially known as Breakfast Tea, English Breakfast.
 
Earl Grey Black Tea:- Bright Colouring black orthodox tea flavoured with the oil of bergamot.

Each Tea contains 5 Teabags

entry.title: Saffron Cardamom Exotic Chai India's Authentic Spiced Tea - Tin Can (Free Exotic Darjeeling Tea 35g)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Teas India
Type: Chai Teas
Price: 39.99

Health Benefits
  • Prevent Cold and Nasal Congestion.
  • Antioxidant-rich helps prevent cell damage.
  • Boost Energy and Immunity.
How to prepare a perfect cup:
  • Mix one portion of milk & two portions of water & set to boil.
  • When on boil add one teaspoon of Masala Chai and boil for another minute.
  • Add sugar as per taste & strain into a cup.
  • Best consumed with milk.

entry.title: Stainless Steel House Tea Infuser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Tea Accessories
Price: 6.19

An attractive and presentable stainless steel infuser shaped like a house  - cottage, with a hook chain and a landing plate. The prominent perforations on all sides allow the water to freely move in and out so that the leaves inside are fully infused seamlessly. There is also control over all the leaves as the infuser - with the tea leaves - may be pulled out anytime desired.

The infuser is not just attractive but is also very easy to open, fill with leaves and then clean, once the tea is ready.

May also be kept in a refrigerator with the infused leaves for a second infusion, if so desired

entry.title: White Exotica Tea - Tin Can
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Teas India
Type: White Tea
Price: 11.10

An exotic White Tea from Darjeeling with each leaf picked tenderly and selectively just before sunrise. The fairly long, light & fluffy leaves of this tea type are an absolute visual delight. Cultivated in the picturesque slopes of the Himalayas at altitudes upto 2000 meters, this rare tea type has excellent health benefits and a very high amount of anti-oxidants, vitamins and minerals.

Learn more about white teas

This tenderly plucked and carefully manufactured tea comes from the sole Temi Tea estate in the north-eastern state of Sikkim in India. This tea is an international favourite and is characteristic of a bright Colour in the cup with a unique and typical flavour.
Disclaimer:
Brocade fabric design may change from time to time and may not be the same as shown in the website.

entry.title: FLAVOURY FINE FETTLE - Six Refreshing Fruit Infusions
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea Co. (P) Ltd.
Type: Tea & Infusions
Price: 10.99

Introducing FLAVOURY FINE FETTLE - a collection of the finest Indian herbs and Floral Petals carefully crafted to bring out a perfect blend of Aroma, Taste, and Health benefits. Each pack is air-sealed and beautifully packaged in a gift box, 

Floral Delight (black tea): Classic rose with a touch of sweetness (stevia) and tartness (hibiscus)

Amethyst Ardor (purple tea): Naturally caffeine-free, known for its delicate floral aroma and slightly sweet taste.

Green Grass (lemon green tea): Invigorating green tea with a refreshing citrus twist (lemon).

Green Blush (green tea): Romantic blend of green tea and rose petals, offering a calming floral fragrance and smooth taste.

Empyrean Azure (blue tea): Naturally caffeine-free butterfly pea flower tea with a subtle floral aroma and beautiful blue color.

Hibiscus Rose (black tea): Tangy and refreshing black tea with vibrant hibiscus flowers, resulting in a beautiful ruby red color.
